name: Ricochet Switch
description:
A three way ball game where breaking a certain glass ball causes your paddles to move between different goals.

Objective: Get to 10 points before the other players

Controls: You control the 2 Green Paddles. The one on the left is controlled with WASD and the one on the right is controlled with the Arrow Keys

More Rules:

1. There is only one ball that allows you to score, hit the ball to change it to your color.

2. If the ball enters a goal while it is your color, you will get a point, unless the ball goes into your own goal, and in that case you will lose a point.

3. If the Purple glass ball goes into your goal, you will also lose a point.

4.  You always control the green players, so the green goal is what you should always try to protect, and other goals are what you should try to score on.
